resources.string: Screen orientation cannot be changed while capturing expanded screenshots.
App switching is not supported while capturing expanded screenshots.
The screen will scroll automatically while capturing expanded screenshots.
Tap the screen to stop scrolling and expanded screenshot will be captured.

After taking a screenshot, tap expanded screenshot to capture the scrollable contents below.
